body.content:
Commercial Banks. Address : C131/3 Farrar Avenue Adabraka
    P.O. Box C1541, Cantonments Accra, GHANA
    Telephone Number: (+233504349286)
    Email: farrarboaghana@financier.com

    YOUR NAME ………………..
    ADDRESS………..
    TEL/FAX……………
    EMAIL ………………..

    ATTN: DR. KOBBY ANDAH
    Foreign Remittance Manager
    Bank of Africa Ghana Limited
    Telephone Number: (+233504349286)
    Email: farrarboaghana@financier.com

Subject: Application for the release & transfer of US$ TEN MILLION
FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS ONLY (US$10.500.000.00)
from Account No: BOA.14-2558-5976 .with routing no 147/x-0017/GH

Sir,

I --------------humbly apply for the release and subsequent transfer
of sum of US$ TEN MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS
(US$10.500.000.00 MUSD ONLY) from account number: BOA $14-2558-5976
with your esteemed bank which belongs to my business partner/associate
Late Mr. Smith B. Andreas who was your customer.

Late Mr. Smith B. Andreas died in a plane crash with his entire
family, He is from Germany the owner of: Smith B Sarl, Accra-Ghana I
am his next of kin. Could you please transfer these funds directly
into my nominated receiving bank account number ----------with BANK
DETAILS

BANK NAME:……………..
BANK ADDRESS:…………….
ACCOUNT NUMBER:…………..
ROUTING NUMBER:…………….
SWIFT NUMBER:……………….
BENEFICIAR NAME:…………….

Please, accept this late application as it was due to logistic
problems occasioned as a result of his death, I solemnly promise to
abide by all your transactional rules and regulations.

I shall appreciate your prompt attention to this request.
Yours faithfully,
AGE: ……………
DATE: ………..
OCCUPATION………..
SIGNATURE…………..

Thanks for your co-operation
